document.full_text: the business of cinema is roaring back to life at cannes after a prolonged bout of gloom, finding renewed strength in money from china, the return of hollywood studios and the pulling power of a-list stars.
document.title: film business booms at cannes amid flurry of deals
lines_and_colors: the business of cinema is roaring back to life at cannes after a prolonged bout of gloom, finding renewed strength in money from china, the return of hollywood studios and the pulling power of a-list stars.
